about_the_game:
"The Last Martian" is a city builder role-playing game in which you will play 10 different civilizations. In the game you will learn about our own civilizations, historical and known from myths or legends.

The game is created by enthusiasts, so you can expect surprising things in it.
We want to develop the game with the community. If we inspired you to an interesting idea related to the game, write to us on our Discord server!

In the coming months, we will be describing the Uroboros universe and the game.
Soon we will show you the first trailer of the game.

Features:
  • original universe
  • different levels of difficulty of the game
  • 20 hours of gameplay in the storyline
  • after completing the storyline, you can continue to play the game
  • the ability to play 10 civilizations in one game
  • Personalization and main character development
  • original music and graphics
  • personalization / crafting of buildings
  • society (managing factions, societies, interesting characters in the game)
  • Your choice matters at the end of the game

Story Introduction
Universum Ouroboros. As a result of the war, life on your planet (Mars) has been destroyed. You are probably the last living Martian. You find yourself on a land that, to your surprise, is inhabited by various civilizations. They are united by a pact, under which earthlings do not use electrical appliances.

You help earthlings rebuild their civilization, affected by the effects of the cosmic war in which you participated. However, you get the impression that someone else has reached the planet. The hand of God that... He wants to live a human life. The enemy seems virtually invincible. However, you are the one who, at the end of time, will inspire people to change history. Unite Earthlings to fight together for... the right to be human.


Expanded campaign and build mode and chill
in the game there are unique scenarios tailored to the problems of a given civilization. A lot of variety and random events are waiting for you. The story told in the game can be freely understood, and difficult decisions are everyday life. The tasks that lie ahead of you require strategic and unconventional thinking. How the further plot of the game will unfold depends on your decisions. Remember that on Earth money is not always the most important, and time can be cyclical, not linear.


After the game, you can continue to play the game, expanding civilizations, or building a new one from scratch.


Different difficulty levels
In the game you can choose different difficulty levels that will allow you to customize the game to your preferences.


Personalization / crafting of buildings and characters
You will decide how the buildings will develop in the next levels. Collect resources and build your own unique buildings thanks to the building crafting mode.

Your character is also customized. After choosing the initial skills, during the story, you will decide on the development of your character.


Your team
Take care of your closest colleagues. It is thanks to them that you will often be able to change the course of history. Also, by delegating tasks to trusted people, you will have more time for key tasks in the game.


In-Game Community
We understand it by taking care of the morale of residents, their needs, managing them. Both at the global level and at the level of social groups concerned. Creating people's thinking is a difficult task, but you will definitely cope with it.



Unique atmosphere and graphic design
Civilizations very often use completely different forces of the Universe to function. This allows for an interesting "what if" game. Saser, piezoelectric crystals, telluric fields. You will learn all this in our game.

We strive to have a unique graphic style that complements the concept for the game. We hope that you will like the end result.

Original music
Musical journey is definitely waiting for you, which will allow you to feel the atmosphere of the game.

short_description: The only survivor. The Last Martian. Unite 10 civilizations against an invincible enemy. Fight for the right to life of the last people in the universe, during 20 hours of storyline. Author's Uroboros Universum. A game unlike any other.
